features: ANTICAVITY: Helps fight cavities for 24 hours when used as directed
FLUORIDE MOUTHWASH: Powered by fluoride to help prevent tooth decay and strengthen teeth and enamel
DENTIST FORMULATED: Dr. Katz created the TheraBreath formulas in 1993 to help his own daughter with her bad breath
ALCOHOL FREE: Non-burning formula made without alcohol that starts working instantly
IT'S A BETTER MOUTHWASH: Try the #1 fastest growing mouthwash brand in the USA (data on file)
body.description: At TheraBreath, we believe that when someone smiles from the heart, they can be stunning. What people need is an oral rinse that doesn’t just give them healthy teeth, it gives them a Healthy Smile. That’s why Dr. Katz created TheraBreath Healthy Smile Oral Rinse, the first oral rinse dentist-formulated to protect your teeth and gums AND help give you a beautiful, happy smile. The secret is in the remineralizing formula, fortified with xylitol and fluoride. You already know that fluoride fights cavities, but what you may not know is that it also remineralizes your teeth. This makes your smile bright and lustrous and gives you the confidence to show that stunning smile to the world. Perfect for when you’re living your best life.We want you to keep your beautiful smile for the rest of your life. That’s why TheraBreath Healthy Smile fights cavities for up to 24 hours when used as directed. It helps rebuild tooth enamel and can even reverse tooth decay. All the while, our patented halitosis-fighting ingredients are providing you with clinically proven fresh breath. At TheraBreath, we’re committed to holistic oral health care. That’s why TheraBreath Healthy Smile Oral Rinse is certified vegan, kosher, and gluten-free. It contains no alcohol or any artificial colors or flavors.TheraBreath Healthy Smile Oral Rinse is sold as a pack of two 16-oz bottles in a delicious Sparkling Mint flavor. As with all our products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fluoride is a poison
reviews.reviewText: Don't believe me? Look it up. Even fluoride toothpaste says on each tube to call poison control if one serving is injected. I have been using TheraBreath Healthy Gums Rinse (which doesn't contain fluoride) for over a year but they were out so I hurriedly ordered this version. Big mistake. It's going in the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Easily the worst of the four different TheraBreath rinses I've tried.
reviews.reviewText: My wife and I swear by the dark blue Fresh Breath variation of this product but this one is terrible. It claims to be alcohol-free but it manages to burn and sting nonetheless. It also tastes horrible, peroxide tastes slightly better imho.The real killer for this one though is that it claims to be anti cavity but in the few months I've been using this variation I've gotten my first cavity in about 3 years. It hadn't advanced much but it was there. This product is gauranteed to work according to the bottle so I will be making a claim before tossing the rest and going back to the fresh breath variation that actually works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars BOTTLES WERE OPEN ONE WAS COMPLETELY EMPTY AND ONE HAD A BROKEN SEAL!!
reviews.reviewText: I received my order, and I have a MAJOR complaint: Both bottles of the TheraBreath mouth rinse were open! One was completely empty. and the other was partially open, with the seal half off. I truly believe the one with the open seal was used by punching a whole on the seal. and using the mouth rinse directly from the bottle...Disgusting!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this mouthwash. Seriously. But the price went from $17 for 2 16oz bottles… to $35+. I am so sorry but that’s not happening. I thought this was a mistake but apparently not! And I’ve been using/buying this mouthwash for over a year now. Too bad, so sad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t Buy - Stay Away
reviews.reviewText: Stay away from these gimmicks, stick to buying Crest or other well known brands. This didn’t do anything. It was just flavored liquid to help freshen up your mouth for a few minutes, I rather just chew gum or have a mint and it will work better. There was no difference after using it for over a month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It does in fact burn
reviews.reviewText: Despite what it says on the bottle, to me and my partner every time we use it we have a burning/tingling sensation. It makes the 1 minute of rinsing feel so long and by the time I’m done, my tongue doesn’t feel great. The mouthwash certainly works I’m sure but I don’t recommend this if you have even slightly sensitive teeth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars This is gross!!
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure what's "fresh" smelling, or tasting about this product. This is expensive, and I can't believe people buy it, after trying it for myself! Not at all a 24hr anything! There's a very filmy, nasty taste, and feeling after using it. That's almost 17.00 I'll never get back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does not burn! …it kinda tastes good 😂 LOVE IT RECOMMENDED (they did give me the healthy smile version and not the anti cavity but it still works amazing!)
This is the best mouthwash I have ever used. Has fluoride and xylitol which are both very good for helping to prevent cavities. It isn’t too strong. Even my kids like the flavour.
Singapore don’t sell these at retail stores (or maybe there is but I didn’t know). Loved the product
